about_the_game:
Robocoil is a fast-paced action game where you control tiny robots called “Robos” as they battle it out in a child’s room. With a variety of game modes, chaotic action, and plenty of ways to outsmart and outplay your opponents.

Robocoil is designed for thrilling singleplayer, multiplayer, and co-op experiences. Whether you're dodging in a frantic game of Tag, outmaneuvering in Hide and Seek, or battling it out with Blasters, the fun never stops.

Game Features

Multiple Game Modes

From fast-paced Tag and Hide & Seek to competitive Blaster Fights and creative Prop Hunt, each mode brings its own objectives and challenges.

Varied Items & Power-Ups

Discover unique items like blasters, rocket boots, and EMP grenades, along with special power-ups like speed boosts, shields, and cloaking abilities to change the tide of battle.

Dynamic Gameplay Mechanics

Every match feels fresh with adjustable maps, environmental interactions, and fast-paced, easy-to-learn mechanics that keep players engaged.

Customization

Personalize your Robo with a variety of skins, colors, and decals. Unlock new gear and upgrades through gameplay to truly make your Robo your own.

And also


Singleplayer, Multiplayer, and CO-OP modes.

Multiple game modes including Tag, Hide & Seek, Blaster Fight, Prop Hunt, and more.

Team-based game modes and free-for-all competition.

Real-time strategic combat with fast-paced gameplay mechanics.

Up to 8 players in multiplayer mode (Online & LAN).

Customization options for Robos, including colors, shapes, decals, and skins.

Adjustable maps with dynamic environments.

Wide variety of items including blasters, punch launcher, EMP grenades, and gears.

Unique power-ups like speed boost, shield, cloaking, holo-camo, and rocket boots.

Various drivable vehicles.

Meet the Robos

The Robos are miniature bots, specially built for competitive fun. Each Robo can be customized with unique colors, shapes, and decals, making your bot stand out in the heat of battle.

They also unlock special abilities by collecting "drivers" scattered across the map, giving them the edge in critical moments. Whether you're focusing on agility, power, or defense, every Robo can be tailored to fit your playstyle.

short_description: Robocoil is a fast-paced multiplayer CO-OP game set in a playful kid's room! Team up or go head-to-head in exciting modes like Tag, Hide & Seek, and Blaster Fight. Customizable tiny robots, endless fun!
